algorithm_technique: Sliding window with hashmap to track character indices.
problem_summary_simple: Find the longest substring without any repeating characters.
problem_summary_technical: Sliding window with a hashmap. Expand window, if duplicate found, move left pointer past the last occurrence of the duplicate.
key_insights: The hashmap stores the last seen index of each character.
When a repeating character is encountered, the left pointer is advanced to `max(left, last_seen_index + 1)`.
This ensures the window always contains unique characters.
